properties.description: After creating the external data source in 06, we can query data by combining BULK and DATA_SOURCE

content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id  SMALLINT  1,
        borough VARCHAR(255) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(255) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(255) 4
    )
    AS [result]
